Proving Grounds

Nightfall Info

Champions:

Shields

Walkthrough

Tank Entrance

  • Go along far left side to skip the enemies at spawn
  • When the miniboss puts up his shield at 50% health, an Unstoppable Champion and ads will spawn from the left.
  • Watch out for turrets.

Tank Room

Don't die
